student guide.title: How to join a project
student guide.text: Make account on the website, then open the link send by your professor

student guide.title: How to make a new portfolio
student guide.text:
Go to the project page, click on 'Create a new portfolio'
You will be redirected to a new portfolio where you can make paragraph and add file

student guide.title: How to upload a file on your portfolio
student guide.text:
Go on portfolio and make a paragraph if you don’t already, add one
Select files or drag and drop you want to add in the upload area

student guide.title: How to download portfolio
student guide.text: Go on the portfolio you want to download. Then click on the download button (near the title)

professor guide.title: How to get a professor account
professor guide.text: Make an account on the website, then ask the website admin to change your account role

professor guide.title: How to make a new project
professor guide.text:
Go to the project page, click on 'Create a new project'
A new project will appear and let you change the title and the description

professor guide.title: How to invite student in your project
professor guide.text:
In your project, click on “generate invite link”, copy it and send it to your student
Your student will be able to join your project and make portfolio
If you refresh your page, your student will appear with their portfolio name (if they have make one) that let you see it

professor guide.title: How to comment portfolio of your student
professor guide.text: Go to the portfolio you want to comment, then click on 'add a comment'

professor guide.title: How to download portfolio or project
professor guide.text: Go on the project/portfolio you want to download. Then click on the download button (near the title)
